strapiPost.title: We Found a Seat at Ella's Table for a Weekend Brunch
strapiPost.content:
Located on the U of A campus, within walking distance from Dickson and the Fayetteville Square, Ella's Table at Carnall Hall should be your next stop for a weekend brunch.

  • The Hill(s): With a new menu and chef who reigns from SoCal, he and Ella's Table have come together to bring modern American favorites with a creative twist.
  • Best of both: Like every solid weekend brunch, they offered a variety of breakfast and lunch options. The chicken sandwich caught our eye (pro tip - switch the bun for a biscuit), and the eggs benedict came highly recommended.

Check out the restaurant and its menu HERE to learn more.
